LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Acid.label: OTC grenades(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Acid.descriptio: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Acid damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Cryo.label: OTC grenades(Cryo)
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Cryo.descriptio: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Cryo damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Fire.label: OTC grenades(Fire)
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_Fire.descriptio: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Fire damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_EMP.label: OTC grenades(EMP)
LanguageData.OTC_MechUpgrade_Grenades_EMP.description: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful EMP damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.OCC_MechUpgrade_Grenades.label: OCC grenades
LanguageData.OCC_MechUpgrade_Grenades.description: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Blast damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.

LanguageData.ODC_MechUpgrade_Grenades.description: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Stun damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
LanguageData.OMG_MechUpgrade_Grenades.label: Mercenaries grenades
LanguageData.OMG_MechUpgrade_Grenades.description: A grenade belt loaded with explosives that deal powerful Necrobane damage on explode. Designed to be used by mechanoids.\n\nCan be reloaded using Obsidia Ammo Kit.
